results.firPara: • German defender moves to Arsenal for a fee of around £35m
results.secPara: Arsenal have announced the signing of the defender Shkodran Mustafi from Valencia. The central defender, 24, arrives after Arsène Wengers near summer-long pursuit and shortly after Calum Chambers loan departure to Middlesbrough.
results.webTitle: Arsenal complete signing of defender Shkodran Mustafi from Valencia

results.firPara: And with that, its probably time to wrap this blog up for the day. Cheers for reading, well be back for more of the same tomorrow.
results.secPara: To keep up with all the piping hot action while were away, and to take a look at whats gone down so far, check out our transfer window page...
results.webTitle: Transfer news live: Arsenal sign Lucas Pérez, Hart to Torino, Barcelona seal Alcácer - as it happened

results.firPara: Crystal Palace have announced the signing of the striker Loïc Rémy on a season-long loan from Chelsea and have rejected Tottenhams new £21m offer for Wilfried Zaha.
results.secPara: Palace confirmed the move for Rémy, who made just three Premier League starts for Chelsea last season, on Tuesday, with the club understood to be paying a loan fee of around £3m for the 29-year-old. They have an option to buy him next summer.
results.webTitle: Crystal Palace sign Rémy on loan and reject new Tottenham bid for Zaha

results.firPara: Stoke are closing in on the signing of Bruno Martins Indi from FC Porto after agreeing a deal to take the Holland central-defender on a season-long loan.
results.secPara: Martins Indi, who moved to Portugal from Feyenoord for €7.7m, has been told he is free to leave the Estádio do Dragão this summer after Porto lined up Manchester Citys Eliaquim Mangala as his replacement.
results.webTitle: Stoke set to sign Bruno Martins Indi from FC Porto on season-long loan

results.firPara: Sergio Agüero has been charged with violent misconduct and will miss the derby with Manchester United on 10 September if found guilty.
results.secPara: The charge relates to Manchester Citys 3-1 victory over West Ham United on Sunday when Agüero appeared to elbow Winston Reid late on in the contest. A statement released by the FA on Tuesday said Sergio Agüero has been charged for an alleged act of violent conduct which was not seen by the match officials but caught on video … He has until 6pm on Wednesday 31 August to reply.
results.webTitle: Sergio Agüero could miss Manchester derby after FA misconduct charge

results.firPara: After waiting all summer for a senior signing Hull City made three in one day. Much to the delight of Mike Phelan, the caretaker manager, Ryan Mason opted to swap Tottenham Hotspur for Hull rather than Sunderland, becoming the Humberside clubs record signing.
results.secPara: Hull have paid slightly more than the £10m they gave Palermo in exchange for Abel Hernández to secure the services of the 25-year-old midfielder, who has one England cap, and they also signed David Marshall, the Cardiff City goalkeeper, for a fee which could rise to £5m. The acqusition of the third new face involved a £1m investment in the Manchester United forward Will Keane.
results.webTitle: Hull City sign Ryan Mason from Tottenham for club record fee

results.firPara: In todays Fiver Transfers galore, the inside track on the Do One Express and those damn pesky rats … getting everywhere
results.secPara: In todays Fiver Transfers galore, the inside track on the Do One Express and those damn pesky rats … getting everywhere
results.webTitle: The Portuguese kidder’s nose growing ever longer

results.firPara: The sympathy vote has shifted from Manchester Citys Joe Hart to the 24-year-old midfielder surplus to requirements at Arsenal, who is paying the price for missing too many games through injury
results.secPara: The sympathy vote has shifted from Manchester Citys Joe Hart to the 24-year-old midfielder surplus to requirements at Arsenal, who is paying the price for missing too many games through injury
results.webTitle: Jack Wilshere beats Joe Hart in transfer tales of woe table this summer

results.firPara: Chelsea are close to agreeing a deal with Fiorentina for Marcos Alonso, with Antonio Contes side expected to pay a fee of around £23m (€27m).
results.secPara: The Chelsea manager has been keen to add a new left-back to his squad after allowing the Ghana international Baba Rahman to join Schalke on loan this month, with the former Real Madrid and Bolton Wanderers defender Alonso now identified as his primary target.
results.webTitle: Chelsea close to signing Fiorentina’s Marcos Alonso for £23m

results.firPara: • Manchester United midfielder excluded from the first-team squad
results.secPara: Bastian Schweinsteiger has told José Mourinho he could still help Manchester United if given a chance though the midfielder insisted there is no problem with the manager despite being excluded from the first-team squad.
results.webTitle: Bastian Schweinsteiger: I have no problem with José Mourinho
